item.title: Builds
item.description: All Github Releases Release Download Git Message Conversations - May 25, 2020 [8475a28] control voice call volume when playing audio through earpiece. fixes #3705 Conversations - May 24, 2020 [7ca543e] replace /me when quoting messages. fixes #3669 Conversations - May 22, 2020 [88cc097] fail pending messages on policy violation. fixes #3735 Conversations - May 22, 2020 [ed4d7bf] reset tone manager after reaching NULL status Conversations - May 21, 2020 [685e01e] give TonManager control over audio mode to play dial tones on earpiece.
